item.title: 阿萨德忠实拥护者在叙利亚海岸袭击政府军
item.description: 叙利亚内政部将该国地中海沿岸的暴力事件归咎于巴沙尔-阿萨德被推翻政权的残余势力。【原文：At least three people were killed and 60 injured in Latakia, with Syria’s Interior Ministry blaming the violence along the country’s Mediterranean coastline on the remnants of Bashar al-Assad’s toppled regime.】

item.title: 路易斯-格斯特纳逝世，他是IBM首席执行官，被誉为IBM扭亏为盈的功臣，享年83岁
item.description: 路易斯-格斯特纳（Louis Gerstner）于周六去世，他在国际商用机器公司（International Business Machines Corp.享年 83 岁。【原文：Louis Gerstner, who took over International Business Machines Corp. when it was on its deathbed and resuscitated it as a technology industry leader, died Saturday. He was 83.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行将扩大主要债券组合以提高 "灵活性
item.description: 土耳其央行明年将加大政府债券购买力度，以加强用于管理里拉流动性的关键投资组合。【原文：Turkey’s central bank will boost government bond purchases next year to strengthen a key portfolio that’s used in managing lira liquidity.】

item.title: 伊朗称从俄罗斯向太空发射了三颗卫星
item.description: 伊朗称其周日从俄罗斯将三颗卫星送入轨道，此举可能会加剧德黑兰更广泛行动的紧张局势。【原文：Iran said it sent three satellites into orbit from Russia on Sunday, a move that may intensify tensions over Tehran’s broader actions.】

item.title: 警告：新兴市场一周前瞻将于 1 月 4 日重启
item.description: 新兴市场一周前瞻》专栏和 "新兴市场发生了什么 "播客将于 12 月 28 日（星期日）停止发布。这两个栏目将于 1 月 4 日星期日恢复。【原文：The Emerging Markets Week Ahead column and the “What’s Happening in EM” podcast won’t be published on Sunday, Dec. 28. Both will resume on Sunday, Jan. 4.】

item.title: 津巴布韦中央银行行长表示，津巴布韦将在 2026 年继续购买矿产
item.description: 津巴布韦央行行长约翰-穆沙亚万胡于周日表示，津巴布韦将在 2026 年继续进行战略性矿产采购，以建立外汇储备，同时推进到 2030 年采用 ZiG 作为其唯一货币的计划。【原文：Zimbabwe will continue to make strategic mineral purchases in 2026 in order to build its foreign currency reserves, as it pushes ahead with plans to adopt the ZiG as its sole currency by 2030, central bank governor John Mushayavanhu said on Sunday.】

item.title: 中国在 2026 年计划中发出持续财政支持经济增长的信号
item.description: 中国承诺在 2026 年扩大财政支出基数，这表明政府将继续提供支持，在充满挑战的外部环境中推动经济增长。【原文：China pledged to broaden its fiscal spending base in 2026, signaling sustained government support to drive growth in a challenging external environment.】

item.title: 马来西亚陆军总司令在调查期间休假：伯纳玛
item.description: 据国有通讯社伯纳玛（Bernama）报道，马来西亚陆军总司令穆罕默德-哈菲祖丁-詹丹（Muhammad Hafizuddeain Jantan）已立即休假，等待对针对他的指控进行调查。【原文：Malaysia’s army chief, Muhammad Hafizuddeain Jantan, has taken immediate leave pending an investigation into allegations against him, state-owned news agency Bernama reported.】

item.title: Packer 家族办公室首席执行官以 8500 万澳元出售悉尼住宅：澳大利亚金融时报
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》（Australian Financial Review）报道，悉尼 2025 年最大的房屋销售交易是澳大利亚亿万富翁詹姆斯-帕克（James Packer）家族办公室首席执行官的豪宅，成交价约为 8500 万澳元（5710 万美元）。【原文：Sydney’s biggest home sale transaction of 2025 is a mansion owned by the chief executive officer of Australian billionaire James Packer’s family office, which went for about A$85 million ($57.1 million), the Australian Financial Review reported.】

item.title: 加州在除夕夜降雨前暂避暴风雪
item.description: 周末，加利福尼亚州将从造成四人死亡和圣诞旅行受阻的破坏性假日风暴中得到短暂的喘息，但气象官员警告说，从新年前夜开始，更多的潮湿天气将出现在这个被雨水浸透的州。【原文：California is in for a brief weekend reprieve from damaging holiday storms that killed four people and hobbled Christmas travel, but weather officials warned of more wet weather heading to the rain-soaked state starting on New Year’s Eve.】

item.title: 中国修订对外贸易法以维护国家利益
item.description: 据国营新华社周六报道，中国立法机构批准了对外贸易法修订案，其中纳入了维护国家主权、安全和发展利益的条款。【原文：China’s legislature approved revisions to the country’s foreign trade law, incorporating provisions to safeguard national sovereignty, security and development interests, state-run Xinhua News Agency reported Saturday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯将汽油出口临时禁令延长至二月
item.description: 俄罗斯将汽油出口临时禁令延长至 2 月底，以维持国内燃料市场的稳定。【原文：Russia extended a temporary ban on gasoline exports through the end of February to maintain stability in its domestic fuel market.】

item.title: 英国养老基金有意入股布鲁克菲尔德的中心公园： Sky
item.description: 据天空新闻报道，英国一些最大的公共部门养老基金正在洽谈收购度假公园集团 Center Parcs 的股份。【原文：Some of the UK’s biggest public sector pension funds are in talks to acquire a stake in holiday parks group Center Parcs, Sky News reported.】

item.title: 中国发布管理使用类人人工智能系统的规则草案
item.description: 中国计划收紧有关使用类人人工智能的规定，要求提供商确保其服务合乎道德、安全和透明。【原文：China plans to tighten rules around the use of human-like artificial intelligence by requiring providers to ensure their services are ethical, secure and transparent.】

item.title: 需求降温，11 月中国工业利润下降
item.description: 11 月份，中国工业利润连续第二个月下降，这进一步表明国内需求疲软和持续通货紧缩正在拖累企业盈利。【原文：China’s industrial profits fell for a second month in November, adding to signs that weakening domestic demand and persistent deflation are weighing on corporate earnings.】

item.title: 塞内加尔在超额认购的地区债券销售中筹资 10 亿美元
item.description: 塞内加尔在一次地区债券销售中筹集了 5600 亿非洲法郎（10 亿美元），这次销售延长了数天，因为政府在隐性债务丑闻限制了进入国际资本市场的机会后面临着资金压力。【原文：Senegal raised 560 billion CFA francs ($1 billion) in a regional bond sale that was extended by several days, as the government faces funding pressures after a hidden-debt scandal limited access to international capital markets.】

item.title: 尽管与马克里关系紧张，米莱仍赢得阿根廷预算批准
item.description: 阿根廷参议院批准了哈维尔-米莱伊总统的 2026 年预算法案，巩固了立法上的胜利，克服了自由主义领导人与其最大盟友之间再次出现的紧张关系。【原文：Argentina’s Senate approved President Javier Milei’s budget bill for 2026, cementing a legislative victory that overcame renewed tensions between the libertarian leader and his top ally.】

item.title: 残酷选股年引发数万亿美元基金出走
item.description: 多元化基金经理最不愿意看到的情况是，自己的投资组合中只有七家科技公司；它们都是美国公司，都是巨型公司，都集中在经济的同一个角落。然而，随着本周 S&P 500 指数刷新纪录，投资者再次被迫面对一个痛苦的现实：跟上市场的步伐在很大程度上意味着几乎不拥有其他东西。【原文：The last thing a diversified fund manager wants is to run a portfolio dominated by just seven technology companies — all American, all megacap, clustered in the same corner of the economy. Yet as the S&P 500 pushed to fresh records this week, investors were again forced to confront a painful reality: Keeping pace with the market has largely meant owning little else.】

item.title: 巴西中央银行因银行清算问题面临法院审查
item.description: 巴西中央银行清算 Banco Master SA 的决定正面临着非同寻常的审查，这是一次罕见的司法干预，有可能破坏其监管决定的法律确定性。【原文：Brazil’s central bank is facing extraordinary scrutiny over its decision to liquidate Banco Master SA, a rare instance of judicial intervention that risks undermining the legal certainty of its regulatory decisions.】

item.title: FaZe Clan 影响者因与新东家的合同纠纷而退出
item.description: 本周，在与新管理层的合同谈判失败后，几名成员宣布离职，这使得人气影响者团体 FaZe Clan 的未来再次陷入困境。【原文：The future of the popular influencer group FaZe Clan is in flux once again after several members announced their departures this week following failed contract talks with new management.】

item.title: 美联储数据显示 12 月 10 年期国债交割量激增失败
item.description: 本月，10 年期国债的交割失败率飙升至八年来的最高水平，这是美联储自 2022 年以来缩减债券投资组合的结果。【原文：Delivery fails involving 10-year Treasury notes surged to the highest level in eight years this month, a result of the Federal Reserve’s move to shrink its bond portfolio since 2022.】

item.title: 乌拉圭央行行长发出 2026 年进一步降息的信号
item.description: 乌拉圭央行主席吉列尔莫-托洛萨（Guillermo Tolosa）周五在蒙得维的亚告诉记者，乌拉圭央行计划明年继续降息，通过加快经济增长和削弱货币来使持续走低的通胀率回到4.5%的目标。【原文：Uruguay’s central bank plans to continue cutting interest rates next year to get consistently low inflation back to its 4.5% target by accelerating growth and weakening the currency, Chairman Guillermo Tolosa told reporters in Montevideo Friday.】

item.title: Coinbase 称前代理因交易所黑客事件在印度被捕
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc.首席执行官布莱恩-阿姆斯特朗（Brian Armstrong）说，在黑客贿赂客服代表以获取客户信息数月后，这家美国最大加密货币交易所的一名前客服人员在印度被捕。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. Chief Executive Officer Brian Armstrong said that a former customer service agent for the largest US crypto exchange was arrested in India, months after hackers bribed customer service representatives to gain access to customer information.】

item.title: 人工智能会变成什么？
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 美元将创 6 月以来最差一周，未来数据成关注焦点
item.description: 彭博社的美元指数创下 6 月以来最差一周，国债上涨，因为交易员们期待下月初公布的数据证实美联储 2026 年进一步降息的预期。【原文：A Bloomberg gauge of the dollar headed for its worst week since June and Treasuries rose as traders looked to data due early next month to confirm expectations for further Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts in 2026.】

item.title: 英伟达因人工智能授权交易获利，股价触及历史纪录
item.description: 由于 10 年期国债收益率下滑，投资者将注意力转向大宗商品，美国股市在清淡的假日交易中向历史新高迈进。英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：US stocks advanced toward a fresh record high in thin holiday trading, as yields on 10-year Treasuries slipped and investors shifted attention toward commodities. Nvidia Corp. climbed as analysts viewed a licensing deal with artificial intelligence startup Groq positively.】

item.title: 黎巴嫩推进旨在释放被困银行存款的法律
item.description: 黎巴嫩内阁批准了一项法律提案，允许部分储户收回多年来被困在银行系统中的资金，这是向解决这个中东负债最多国家的金融问题迈出的关键一步。【原文：Lebanon’s cabinet approved a proposed law allowing some depositors to recover funds trapped in the banking system for years, a key step toward untangling the financial troubles immersing the Middle East’s most-indebted nation.】

item.title: 加州面临更多洪水风险，洛杉矶疏散时间延长
item.description: 加利福尼亚州又迎来了暴雨天和山洪暴发的风险，洛杉矶县延长了疏散命令，官员们警告说，在这个繁忙的假期，道路交通将面临危险。【原文：California is facing another day of heavy rain and risks of flash floods, prompting Los Angeles County to extend evacuation orders as officials warn about the dangers for road travel in this busy holiday period.】

item.title: 拉美央行行长发起反美元运动
item.description: 乌拉圭央行行长希望说服拉丁美洲美元化程度最高的国家之一的储蓄者们，他们对美国货币的喜爱既不利于经济，也不利于他们的腰包。【原文：Uruguay’s central bank chief wants to convince savers in one of Latin America’s most dollarized nations that their love affair with the US currency is bad for both the economy and their pocketbooks.】

item.title: 比特币的下滑带来了非同寻常的税收收获机会
item.description: 比特币从历史高位下滑 30%，财务顾问认为这可能会导致比往年更多的数字资产税损收割。【原文：Bitcoin’s 30% slide from its all-time high is creating conditions financial advisers say are likely driving more tax-loss harvesting in digital assets than in previous years.】
